title: LEAVE the Runes System intact
body: I dont concern myself with Masteries as much but leave the RUNES alone please

replies.body:
I feel this new system has no personalization anymore..... so this thing simplifies and standardizes the system you use. 
I enjoy the tweaking personally. I like that i have say so over the actions my character takes and its not laid out for me.
I think I might be done with League now. 
I wish i could get some of my money back though.
i like the rune system and i feel like u learn what runes work for you and what masteries you enjoy.
